items.title: Tech Stock Deterioration And Tariff Twitchiness
items.description: Stocks returned to their losing ways today, weighed down by a fresh round of tech-stock deterioration and tariff twitchiness.

items.title: Microsoft stock drops from news of abandoned data center projects
items.description: Microsoft (MSFT) stock is down after a TD Cowen analyst note explained that the company has abandoned data center projects due to oversupply. Market Domination hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton break down the stock and analyst note. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

items.title: AI stocks weak on word Microsoft drops data center leases in U.S. and Europe
items.description: Investing.com -- There are more jitters in the AI sector Wednesday after analysts at TD Cowen highlighted that their channel checks show Microsoft is canceling data center leases in the U.S. and Europe, following up on his earlier finding.
